Header.title: Care For You
Header.paragraph: The best care service for elderly, disadvantaged and disabled people

About.paragraph: Care4You is a social care service company established by Ms Fatma Karakus to provide high quality elderly people care and support services. Care4You focuses on finding customers who are either elderly or disadvantaged. People who have agoraphobia, certain physical disabilities or disadvantages to doing daily chores such as grocery shopping, going out for a walk, personal grooming, etc. Ms Fatma Karakus is the sole owner of Care4You Ltd Company. She has a remarkable professional career and is willing to capitalise on this experience through Care4You Ltd Company. She has a passion for social and healthcare, and she is a person of principles who dedicates herself in health and a healthy lifestyle. She has the necessary experience to achieve and carry her prospective business in the Care4You Ltd Company into success. Ms Karakus has experience in care of elder and disadvantaged people. She has related nursery education background. Ms Karakus, who has high communication skills, takes all the elderly's care responsibilities and approaches them with love. She believes that love and care can change everything. Therefore, she serves the elderly with devotion and high care.
